title: Fort Pulaski National Monument: Contact Public Affairs
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Contact Public Affairs              Contact Public Affairs       Media requests should be directed to the Public Information Officer: Joel Cadoff Phone: (912) 786-5787 ext. 1208 Fax: (912) 652-4232 E-mail  If you have an urgent media request and the Public Information Officer is not available, please contact the Superintendent's office at (912) 786-8182 ext. 1107.
